name: CIAN
introduce: CIAN protocol is a liquid staking derivatives (“LSD”) focused yield strategy platform, where users could earn either through joining algorithmic strategy vaults or through building their own DeFi strategies using CIAN’s advanced automation tools. CIAN redefines the way a DeFi task is performed -- substitute intricate & time consuming manual operations of your DeFi task with simple ‘task definition’ of few clicks.
